p.s: This is about a place in London called Kiteflyer's Hill where I used to go and spend hours going "When is he coming back?

text.s: So this is another one dedicated to that guy ...
It's a beautiful song written by a guy called Martin Evan, actually, for me.

p.s: Boo Hewerdine, Thomas Dolby, thank you very much for inviting me.
It's been a blessing singing for you.
